title: Attach external account
navigation-back-text: All your settings will be lost. Are you sure you want to exit?

notifications.validate-error: Please fix all the errors on the screen before proceeding

hints.entry-fee: Description about entry fee is here
hints.entry-fee-description: An entry fee is a fee charged to investors upon their investment to a GV Fund. The maximum entry fee is {{maxFee}} %
hints.exit-fee: Description about exit fee is here
hints.exit-fee-description: An exit fee is a fee charged to investors when they redeem shares from a GV Fund. The maximum exit fee is {{maxFee}} %
